question: Which among the following is the incorrect statement:
option1: RBI is the sole authority to mint and distribute coins in India.
option2: For distribution of coins RBI has more than 4000 Currency Chests
option3: The Currency Chests can be both Private and Government Banks
option4: A coin of maximum Rs. 1000 can be minted in India
answer: RBI is the sole authority to mint and distribute coins in India.
